name: first-call-dnp
template:
Hi {{event.contact_name}}, 
This is {{event.agent_name}} your Event Expert from VenueMonk.com. I tried reaching you to help you find venue for your event - {{event.occasion}} in {{event.city}}. 
What would be a good time to have a short call with you to understand your requirements in detail, so that I can personally suggest the best venue options. We can also chat here, Just reply 'Hi'.
PS: Feel free to WhatsApp or call me on {{event.agent_phone}} at any time. I am available 24x7.

*Go Cashless & Win*
Book best venue for your {{event.occasion}} online by securely paying just 20% of the total amount and get assured Amazon vouchers up to Rs. 3000 Free!
*VenueMonk Guarantee*- We Deliver What We Promise!

*{{event.agent_name}}*, ({{event.agent_phone}})
- VenueMonk.com

name: whatsapp-text

name: no-reply-from-customer-2
template:
Hi {{event.contact_name}},
How are you? 
I am awaiting your reply. Please let me know so that we can quickly find and book the best venue for your event.
If you have changed your plans regarding your event or do not wish to take my help to find the best venue for your event, request you to please let me know by just replying 'No', so that I can close your event from our side. 
This would ensure that you do not get any more messages/calls from VenueMonk or any of our partners.

*Go Cashless & Win*

name: send-venue-without-contact
template: We have suggested your venue for the following enquiry: {{event.contact_name}}, event date: {{event.event_date}}, MG: {{event.guests}}, Budget Range: Rs. {{budget_start}} - {{event.budget_end}}.
